title: Choose Greatness
description: We created a voice for the brand around Surf, Sand & Luxury. We wanted the message and medium to come together to `tell a story.

title: Kaveri
description: Built around the voice ‘Everyday Beautiful’, we gave the brand a unique identity & communication palette that embraced a global idiom without losing its Indian roots.

title: Zoi
description: We believe eating out is more than just food & drinks. We focused on the finer things in life that create a sense of memorability for a holistic hospitality brand.

title: Baggit
description: We saw Baggit as an opportunity to evolve a brand voice that was different from the cataloguish nature of the category.

title: Train Strong
description: For a bad ass training shoe, the idea was fairly simple. Put the shoe in a tough training environment and let the visuals speak for themselves.

title: EverEnviro
description: POV was brought on - board to launch the brand through a concerted strategy exercise along with identity development.

title: Ozee
description: We identified a natural constituent for OZEE — young, individualistic — that expects the world to revolve around their pace of life.

title: Walking is a Sport
description: To grow the shoe category, we conceptualized an event that pitched walking as a sport.

title: 360 ONE
description: We went about with evolving a Brand Voice for 360 One that would then become the basis of a composite creative and content effort.

title: CCC
description: We were tasked with evolving a brand identity and visual design style that was global yet captured the regional identity and aspirations of the brand.

title: Nahar Excalibur
description: When the promoters came to us with a luxury project that promised spectacular, timeless views, we knew we had something special on hand.

title: I-Pru Alternates
description: Giving I-Pru Alternates Investments a design refresh. Our effort is intended to give the brand a design form that is distinct and helps it take shape as a luxury offering.
